load.comment: : Nil  ote: No exit load shall be levied in case of switch of investments from  Direct Plan to Regular Plan and vice versa

value.scheme_objective: T The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate returns that are  commensurate with the performance of the Nifty IT Index, subject to  tracking error.   here is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme  will be achieved.
value.suitable_for_investors: Long-term capital growth  Investment in equity and equity related securities covered by Nifty IT Index subject to tracking error
value.type_of_scheme: An open ended scheme replicating / tracking Nifty IT Index
